deck module¶

class deck.Deck¶

Bases : object

A class to represent a deck of tiles used in a domino game.

…

tiles¶

The list of the tiles in the deck

Type

list of tile object

length¶

The length of the deck at the beginning of the game

Type

int

add_tile(tile):

Add a specified tile in the deck

add_predefined(max_value):

Create a complete deck of tiles of a basic domino game

shuffle():

Shuffle the deck

add_predefined(max_value)¶

Create a complete deck of tiles from 0 to max_value and set the value of length.

Paramètres

max_value (int) – The highest value of a tile in the deck

Renvoie

Type renvoyé

None

add_tile(tile)¶

Add a specified tile given in the parameters a the end of the deck.

Paramètres

tile (tile object) – Contains the value of the tile added

Renvoie

Type renvoyé

None

shuffle()¶

Shuffle the deck using the random.shuffle(x) function.

Dominos
